É um ótimo jogo, no estilo competitivo, coop horror...
OBJETIVO: o objetivo do game é simples, 4 sobreviventes enfrentam 1 assassino em uma rodada no qual vão em busca de ligar 5 geradores e abrir um portão no final, para finalmente escapar do assassino, essas são as partidas resumidamente.
Jogando como assassino ou sobrevivente, você vai "upando" eles, para desbloquear novos Perks e itens utilizaveis também que influenciam dentro da partida também...quanto mais pontos fizer em uma partida melhor teu rank.
No geral eu acho esse game muito divertido principalmente jogado com amigos, única coisa que acho estranho é o jeito que o jogo lança seus personagens novos, por meio de dlc, meio que forçando a gastar mais dinheiro com o game.

Fun with friends, the players of the opposite roles can be toxic, sometimes, not always.

I really wish I could give a mixed review of for this game, as the concept is great for both playing and for the "horror" part of this game, but most things in the game are not done the best, at least in my opinion. I have had countless games where the matchmaking has been really bad, putting me with players who have a lot more experience then me, then sometimes the game just sets me with players who have just started the game, despite my rank. Also, after playing this game for so long, it really isn't that scary if you get used to it.

The connection in this game can be a bit weird, even if you play on servers near you, for example, hitboxes being delayed for no reason, perk activation sometimes not working, and this has been a thing for quite awhile.

And this can't be blamed on the Devs, but the community of this game can be really toxic, some people straight up make new accounts just to bully new Killers, ruining their fun and motivation of the game. But as I said, this can't be blamed on the Devs.

There is also a problem with the replay value of this game, there hasn't been a new "game mode" for this game since launch, there has been events that spice the game a bit up from time to time, but the only thing that can maybe make you stay is the tons of cosmetics that they have, but I don't recommend actually buying non-gameplay changing things.
And speaking of microtransactions, there are tons of purchasable dlc for new characters and perks, which is great, there are so many things that can be used and played that it can keep the game alive, but, people mostly just follow the meta, so there really isn't that much difference in most games. 

Now, with that out of the way, let me say why this game can be great. This game heavily relies on teamwork if your on the survivor's side, if one survivor is being chased, other's can do the objective, or maybe the team is split up that there's different "roles", one that saves people that has been caught, one that focuses only on the objective and one being the diversion. The survivors can really make a difference in each game if they coordinate correctly.

As the Killer, you can either have a good time, or just a completely shit match, there is no in-between. But the Killer can be fun, your objective is self explanatory, kill the survivors, pressure them away from their objective, be efficient and merciless. Each Killer has their own unique power, which was a great idea, and they keep on making new Killer ideas that aren't entirely OP, which is amazing! There are so many different things to try out with Killers and perks to change your play-style.

There is also custom games, which is fun, hearing your friends scream and panic is fun :>

In conclusion, I would recommend this game if you want to try out a horror multiplayer game, it can be super frustrating, but if you're patient enough, you might really enjoy this game.

Невозможно играть на манах, все выжившие токсики, всех сильных манов убили, еще добавили имба перки на микаэле рид. Игра за сурва выглядит так: ищешь матч 15 минут выигрываешь генрашем за 5. После новой системы матчмейкинга ранги кидает из крайности в крайность, против пепльного мана играют кровавые сурвы и наоборот.
Buen juego para divertirse con amigos, sin embargo de forma un poco mas "competitiva" de forma solitaria aun no logra engancharme.

Eğer Cidden Güzel Bir Katil Ve Kovalanma Oyunu Seviyorsanız Bu Oyunu Seveceksiniz Katil Ve Karakter Açısından Baya Geniş Korku Filmlerinden Tut Oyun Evrenine Çoğu Katil Var Yani Alacaklar Alın Çünkü Fiyatına Değer Bir Oyun Ve Kaliteli

Muy buen juego, pero.... 
El hecho de que pongan un pero es porque al fin y al cabo en este tipo de juego hay mucho desbalance en cuanto en algunas habilidades tanto de asesinos como de supervivientes (mayormente como asesino).
Siento que hay muchos asesinos que están ¨rotos¨ y que merecen un rework urgentemente para balancear. 
Mas allá de eso el juego esta bueno, y jugarlo con amigos como superviviente o como asesino estando solo es una buena manera de pasar el rato.
